) const defaultValues = { first: 'Robin' , last: 'Crochet' , email: 'crochetrobin@gmail.com' , gender: 'Homme' , city: 'ville' , password: '12345' , confirm_password: '12345' } const options = ['France', 'Russie', 'United Kingdom', 'United States', 'Allemagne'] const Register = () => { const {formValues, validate, register, handleOnChange} = useFormValidation({formName:'register', defaultValues: defaultValues}); const {first,last, email, city, country, gender, password, confirm_password} = formValues['register'] ?? {} useEffect (() => { register(defaultValues); },[]); useEffect (() => { validate(formValues['register'] ?? {}); },[formValues]); return ( <>
